author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637
title: Hungers preuention: or, the whole arte of fowling by water and land. Containing all the secrets belonging to that arte, and brought into a true forme or method, by which the most ignorant may know how to take any kind of fowle, either by land or water. Al
imprint: "London: Printed by A. Math[ewes for Anne Helme and Thomas Langley, and are to be sold at their Shops in Saint Dunstons Church yard, and ouer against the Sarazens head without Newgate, 1621"
